100: First Contact: Event
100_s0: Start state
100_s1: Lower logic: start
100_s2: Lower logic: setting
100_s3: Lock-on
100_s3_e0: [Operation] Lock on
100_s4: Waiting for death
100_s4_w0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
100_s5: [LIB] Initial termination setting_SubState
100_s6: [LIB] Attack: Single issue: General purpose _SubState
x0: [LIB] Initial termination setting
x0_s0: Start state
x0_s1: Initial end setting: Start
x0_s1_e0: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
x0_s2: End state
x1: [LIB] Attack: Single issue: General purpose
x1_p0: Attack type
x1_p1: Short navigation mesh check
x1_s0: Start state
x1_s1: Attack: Under attack
x1_s1_e0: [Attack] Melee attack
x1_s2: Attack: Cancel wait
x1_s3: Attack: Success: End state
x1_s4: Attack: Failure: End state
